title: vandaruLvAi tOghai
sahitya:
vanNdaruLvAI tOghai mayil vAhanA maru tuNaiyillai vaLLi manamOhanA nI


anupallavi

  danti mukhark-karumai tambiyAi vanda kuzhandhAi
 kandA nin kazhalinai tuNai aiyA


caraNam    un tiru nAmam onrE vAzhvirk-kinbam UTTum amudam murugA SaNmukhA enu
enniLam kanrup-paruvam mudalE nambi pulambuvad-ariyAyO kai viDuvAyO
